activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12711
activity.text:
Hi @AdityaJ2305 👋

I’d like to work on this issue .

 Proposed Solution:
- I will update the Patient Details component so that phone numbers become clickable `tel:` links and addresses become clickable `https://maps` links.
- I’ll ensure they open in a new tab or trigger a phone call as expected.

ETA:
I’ll submit a PR within 1–2 days after assignment.

Looking forward to contributing—thanks!

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12727
activity.text:
Hi @AdityaJ2305 @rithviknishad 

I'd like to work on this issue as part of the Full Stack Intern application.

Proposed Solution:
- I will conditionally render the “Add” button if there are no medicines in the prescription section.
- If medicines exist, the “Edit” button will be shown.
- I’ll use existing design system components and follow project conventions.

 ETA:
2 days from assignment.

If approved, please assign this issue to me. Thank you!
